Articles.Content: I was wondering if there was a way to include an option that lets the player switch between the normal G-Force readout to a digital G-Force readout. I am asking this because even though the dial goes up to 15 G's, but of course, it doesn't stop there:cool:! This should be the perfect time to implement this since there is the 0.23 update with the overhauled UI. Then there should also be a readout for sideways G's.
If you press F3, there's a readout that tells you your highest G-force achieved, even though the one near the navball only goes up to 15. I once got it to 27 G's.
You might also try the SteamGauges mod, though I've found they need a lot of screen real-estate to be useful.
